constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 33 (Friday, February 18, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. WESTERMAN:
H.R. 6800.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 1. Congress has the power to
lay and collect taxes, duties, imposts and excises, to pay
the debts and provide for the common defense and general
welfare of the United States.
[Page H1133]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: IRS PRIORITIES Act of 2022
